next st* around ending with bobble st slip_stitch to top of 1st double_crochet 54 13 chain 1 single_crochet in next st 1 single_crochet in each st around slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet 54 14 chain 1 turn skip next st *double_crochet in next st 5-double_crochet bobble in next st skip next st 1 double_crochet in next st* around ending with bobble st slip_stitch to top of chain 3 54 15 chain 1 single_crochet in next st 1 single_crochet in each st to end 54 16 chain 1 turn skip next st *double_crochet in next st 5-double_crochet bobble in next st skip next st* around ending with bobble st 54 17 chain 1 turn single_crochet in same st 1 single_crochet in each of the next 4 st 1 double_crochet in each of the next 12 st 1 single_crochet in each of the next 20 st 1 double_crochet in each of the next 12 st 1 single_crochet in each of the next 5 st slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet 54 18-19 repeat row 17 two times more without turning at the end of the row 54 20 chain 1 single_crochet in same st and in each around slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet finish off and weave in ends uk stitch version uk to us stitch conversion double_crochet double_crochet = single_crochet single_crochet treble_crochet treble = double_crochet double_crochet special stitches 5-treble_crochet bobble *yarn over insert hook into st yarn over draw loop through st draw through 2 loops on hook* repeat this 4 times more you should have 6 sts on hook draw yarn through all 6 sts and chain 1 1 5-treble_crochet made treble_crochet dtr step 1 yarn over three times then insert hook into next stitch step 2 yarn over hook and draw yarn through stitch there are five loops on the hook step 3 *yarn over and draw through two loops on hook* there are now four loops remaining on the hook repeat from * to * 3 more times this completes one double treble_crochet form a ring using magic loop method 1 magic loop method 3 chain 11 treble_crochet in ring join 12 2 3 chain turn 1 5tr bobble in next st *1 treble_crochet in next st 1 5tr bobble in next st* continue around join with slip_stitch to top of 1st treble_crochet 18 3 1 chain turn 1 double_crochet in same st 2 double_crochet in each st around
